description.@en: Your cloak glimmers and twinkles with brilliant light, as to obfuscate your true location.

criticalFailure.@en: With a terrible tearing sound, the velvet mantle takes to the air, ripping from your neck. A gust of wind catches it and it flies off, never to be found again.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but all ranged weapon attacks automatically miss you.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, all ranged weapons that arenâ€™t Magickal in nature cannot apply Fury Dice to their Total Damage when harming you. However, because the cloak shimmers with a low light, you cannot use the Stealth Skill to hide.

reagents.@en: An expensive velvet mantle, worn on your back
